vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Gresham Smith to provide engineering services for the evaluation and design of erosion control improvements at five locations (list attached to Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $349,317.50 - Financing: Flood Protection and Stormwater Drainage (C) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($334,182.50) and (2025 Certificate of Obligation Fund) ($15,135.00)
